SA15n1230:6: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
SA15n1230:8: yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
SA15n1230:12: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
SA15n1230:14: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham |
SA15n1230:15: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ |
SA15n1230:18: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
SA15n1230:22: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15n1230:24: anyathā'sati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu |
SA15n1230:26: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
SA15n1230:28: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt;
SA15n1230:41: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
SA15n1230:42: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam |
SA15n1230:45: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
SA15n1230:51: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
SA15n1230:52: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt go-pratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam |
SA15n1230:56: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
SA15n1230:62: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito'śvādīn badhnāti |
SA15n1230:63: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
SA15n1230:67: vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam |
SA15n1230:73: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1230:78: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
SA15n1230:86: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva;
SA15n1230:90: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
SA15n1230:105: indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet?
SA15n1230:109: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
SA15n1230:115: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet ?
SA15n1230:118: tato yatrārthakriyābhedādisacivaḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ tatra vastubhedaḥ, ghaṭavat |
SA15n1230:121: na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti |
SA15n1230:125: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
SA15n1230:131: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate |
SA15n1230:132: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
SA15n1230:133: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
SA15n1230:137: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt |
SA15n1230:151: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
SA15n1230:152: vicitraśaktitvāt pramāṇānāmiti tadapyaindriyakaśābdapratibhāsayorekasvarūpagrāhitve bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham |
SA15n1230:153: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
SA15n1230:155: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet?
SA15n1230:160: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa?
SA15n1230:161: asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ |
SA15n1230:162: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavavodhaḥ |
SA15n1230:165: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n1230:170: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
SA15n1230:176: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti |
SA15n1230:180: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam |
SA15n1230:184: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ |
SA15n1230:186: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ |
SA15n1230:189: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam ||
SA15n1230:191: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante |
SA15n1230:198: vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
SA15n1230:209: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
SA15n1230:213: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt |
SA15n1230:214: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā |
SA15n1230:217: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet ?
SA15n1230:219: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati ?
SA15n1230:220: yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā |
SA15n1230:221: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ |
SA15n1230:223: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
SA15n1230:232: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam |
SA15n1230:239: tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati |
SA15n1230:242: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti |
SA15n1230:246: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
SA15n1230:264: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya |
SA15n1230:271: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau |
SA15n1230:274: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye'pratibhāsanāt |
SA15n1230:275: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau |
SA15n1230:278: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ ||
SA15n1230:282: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko'rthaḥ ?
SA15n1230:285: ucyate; yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ |
SA15n1230:290: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ |
SA15n1230:291: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva |
SA15n1230:293: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam ||
SA15n1230:312: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ |
